short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use AI to automatically uncheck email subscription checkboxes on webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension use AI to recognize text on the webpage. It automatically uncheck and highlight checkboxes that make you to subscribe to marketing emails.

No more junk marketing email in your email box.
